value.name: Judicial-Nominations Update
value.description: Last week, the Senate Judiciary Committee reported out to the full Senate the first judicial nominees of the Biden administration.

value.name: Biden Signs Bill Addressing Hate Crimes Against Asian-Americans
value.description: The measure is the first legislative action that Congress has taken to bolster law enforcement’s response to attacks on people of Asian descent during the pandemic. The White House is exploring options to help rebuild the besieged Gaza Strip.
